page.title: 09HEALTH CENTRES AND CLINICS
page.content: ARMADALE HEALTH CENTRE IS SITUATED IN OCHILVIEW SQUARE.THERE ARE 7 DOCTORS, A CONSULTANT (COMES ONCE A MONTH) AND A PSYCHIATRIST COMES ON WEDNESDAYS.IT OPENS: {MONDAY TO FRIDAY { 8.00AM 6.00PM {SATURDAYS { 8.30AM-10.30AM} NORTH STREET CLINIC IS OPEN: {MONDAY TO FRIDAY { 8.30AM-5.00PM THE TYPES OF CLINIC ARE BABY CLINIC (WEDNESDAY) ,ANTE NATAL (MONDAY) ,PARENT CRAFT (THURSDAY) AND CYTOLOGY CLINIC (FRIDAY).THE PERSONEL ARE: HEALTH VISITORS AND MIDWIFE PSYCHIATRIC AND DISTRICT NURSES,ONE SPEECH THERAPIST,ONE PHYSIO THERAPIST, ONE CHIROPODIST, AND ONE DIETIAN.
